markdownRemark.html: Elisa Bruttini professor at the Siena University (Italy), and scientific director of the Musei Senesi Foundation, explains the role of emotions in designing museums: how emotions are a pre-condition for learning and how they facilitate emotional experiences and even aim to foster empathy in visitors.
